{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_Turn}}{{WarnDeprecated|[[A_SetAngle]]}}
'''A_Turn''' (float ''angle'')
* ''angle'': The angle by which to turn, in degrees.
Equivalent to calling [[A_SetAngle]] and using the "angle" keyword in the parameter. For example, <tt>A_Turn(15)</tt> is the same as <tt>A_SetAngle(angle+15)</tt>.
{{DEFAULTSORT:Turn}}[[category:Decorate Status change functions]]
